short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collapses comment thread into summary sentence on Hacker News

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Inspired by the Hacker News Collapse extension by tomi.czinege

Provides a summary sentence for every level of a comment thread.

Helps the user skim the comment thread quickly before deciding to read the thread.
